meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Troy Steinmetz Jennifer Fuquay Alan Lin Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7519.

td.p: Troy Steinmetz, a fundraising manager from Santa Clara, California
Jennifer Fuquay, a stay-at-home mom from San Antonio, Texas
Alan Lin, a software engineer from Santa Barbara, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $64,800)

tr.td: FROM PAGE TO SCREEN
OLD JOBS
KINDA SCIENCEY
CAKE TALK
SPORTS
NOT ON THE PERIODIC TABLE
(Alex: Even though each correct response will end in "um.")
